metadata.title: CVE-2019-18408 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
archive_read_format_rar_read_data in archive_read_support_format_rar.c inlibarchive before 3.4.0 has a use-after-free in a certain ARCHIVE_FAILEDsituation, related to Ppmd7_DecodeSymbol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.8+esm1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.8+esm1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.8+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.8+esm1').
